title: Drawing, "Lamentation over Christ", ca. 1800
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and wash, black chalk on off-white laid paper, laid down
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertically arranged figure group. In the center, Virgin Mary cradles Jesus' body. Joseph stands on the left with his arms outstretched and several angels fly overhead.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lamentation over Christ", ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Pen and brown ink, brush and wash, black chalk on off-white laid paper, laid down. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5668.
